name: Najikaï
description:
Najikai is a two player coop platformer in which one player controls the character and the other adjusts the position of the platforms. 

The game requires at least one gamepad or at least on MIDI controller(with at least two sliders or knobs). 

Gamejam Team:

David Martin
Émeric Morin
Kendji Accamah
Joanie Morin
Alex Tommi Morin 
Nicolas Lachance-Brais

Voice samples from:

Claude Jr Labonté Lefebvre
Roméo Jr Labonté
